sys_openapi_operation.name: Create Linode
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Create Linode","fOperationId":"createLinodeInstance","fDescription":"Creates a Linode Instance on your Account. In order for this
request to complete successfully, your User must have the `add_linodes` grant. Creating a
new Linode will incur a charge on your Account.

Linodes can be created using one of the available Types. See
[GET /linode/types](/api/v4/linode-types) to get more
information about each Type's specs and cost.

Linodes can be created in any one of our available
[Regions](/api/v4/regions) for a list
of available Regions you can deploy your Linode in.

Linodes can be created in a number of ways:

* Using a Linode Linux Distribution image or an Image you created based on another Linode.
 * The Linode will be `running` after it completes `provisioning`.
 * A default config with two Disks, one being a 512 swap disk, is created.
 * `swap_size` can be used to customize the swap disk size.
 * Requires a `root_pass` be supplied to use for the root User's Account.
 * It is recommended to supply SSH keys for the root User using the `authorized_keys` field.
 * You may also supply a list of usernames via the `authorized_users` field.
 * These users must have an SSH Key associated with your Profile first. See [/profile/sshkeys](/api/v4/profile-sshkeys/#post) for more information.

* Using a StackScript.
 * See [/linode/stackscripts](/api/v4/linode-stackscripts) for
 a list of available StackScripts.
 * The Linode will be `running` after it completes `provisioning`.
 * Requires a compatible Image to be supplied.
 * See [/linode/stackscript/{stackscriptId}](/api/v4/linode-stackscripts-stackscript-id) for compatible Images.
 * Requires a `root_pass` be supplied to use for the root User's Account.
 * It is recommended to supply SSH keys for the root User using the `authorized_keys` field.
 * You may also supply a list of usernames via the `authorized_users` field.
 * These users must have an SSH Key associated with your Profile first. See [/profile/sshkeys](/api/v4/profile-sshkeys/#post) for more information.

* Using one of your other Linode's backups.
 * You must create a Linode large enough to accommodate the Backup's size.
 * The Disks and Config will match that of the Linode that was backed up.
 * The `root_pass` will match that of the Linode that was backed up.

* Create an empty Linode.
 * The Linode will remain `offline` and must be manually started.
 * See [POST /linode/instances/{linodeId}/boot](/api/v4/linode-instances-linode-id-boot/#post).
 * Disks and Configs must be created manually.
 * This is only recommended for advanced use cases.


**Important**: You must be an unrestricted User in order to add or modify
tags on Linodes.
","fPath":"/linode/instances","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"The requested initial state of a new Linode.","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson5194466579","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["region","type"],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[{"fName":"backup_id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A Backup ID from another Linode's available backups. Your User must have
`read_write` access to that Linode, the Backup must have a `status` of
`successful`, and the Linode must be deployed to the same `region` as the Backup.
See [/linode/instances/{linodeId}/backups](/api/v4/linode-instances-linode-id-backups)
for a Linode's available backups.

This field and the `image` field are mutually exclusive.
","fFormat":"int32","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"backups_enabled","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"If this field is set to `true`, the created Linode will automatically be
enrolled in the Linode Backup service. This will incur an additional charge.
The cost for the Backup service is dependent on the Type of Linode deployed.

This option is always treated as `true` if the account-wide `backups_enabled`
setting is `true`. See [account settings](#operaton/getAccountSettings)
for more information.

Backup pricing is included in the response from [/linodes/types](/api/v4/linode-types)
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"},{"fName":"swap_size","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"When deploying from an Image, this field is optional, otherwise it is ignored. This is used to set the swap disk size for the newly-created Linode.
","fFormat":"int32","fDefault":512,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"type","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The [Linode Type](/api/v4/linode-types) of the Linode you are creating.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"region","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The [Region](/api/v4/regions) where the Linode will be located.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"image","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An Image ID to deploy the Disk from. Official Linode Images start with `linode/ `, while your Images start with `private/`.
See [/images](/api/v4/images) for more information on the Images available for you to use.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"root_pass","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/DiskRequest/properties/root_pass","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"authorized_keys","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"requestapplicationjson5194466579","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A list of SSH public keys to deploy for the root user on the newly-created Linode. Only accepted if `image` is provided.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"stackscript_id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The StackScript to deploy to the newly-created Linode. If provided, "image" must also be provided, and must be an Image that is compatible with this StackScript.
","fFormat":"int32","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"stackscript_data","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"An object containing responses to any User Defined Fields present in the StackScript being deployed to this Linode. Only accepted if `stackscript_id` is given. The required values depend on the StackScript being deployed.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"booted","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Whether to boot this Linode after the deploy is complete. Defaults to true if `image` is provided. Not accepted if not deploying from an Image.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"},{"fName":"label","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Linode/properties/label","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"tags","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Linode/properties/tags","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"group","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Linode/properties/group","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"},{"fName":"private_ip","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"If true, the created Linode will have private networking enabled.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"},{"fName":"authorized_users","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"requestapplicationjson5194466579","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A list of usernames. If the usernames have associated SSH keys, the keys will be appended to the root users `~/.ssh/authorized_keys` file automatically.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"A new Linode is being created.
